question: Why was Paul confident in his epistle to Philemon that the letter would grant his request? Because
options: Philemon was a Roman citizen like Paul
They were from the same town
Onesimus would no longer be a slave
They were partners in the faith of Christ
answer: They were partners in the faith of Christ
